column1: My anelace I kept with me for some dozens of cycles further until I was forced to exchange its inert hilt for some riches at the western town of Fri. I do not know of its fate, but the pommel on it is very distinctive, being as it is in the shape of the third compound stellation of the score-faced form which itself envelops a self-swivelling oculus...

...That part carries the main strength of the object, which beyond disintegration has the power to drink and retain memories of the victims it has extinguished then passing them onto whoever has attached the flagella of the haft to their body...

...You must understand that this is a very dangerous process for the unprepared receiver both during the procedure and after it, one which must be moderated by special substances, for the memories are permanently retained.
